actions.text: Mr. Lewis (CA) raised a point of order against the Kucinich amendment (A003). Mr. Lewis stated that the amendment violated section 302F of the Congressional Budget Act. Point of order overruled by the Chair.
On agreeing to the Kucinich amendment (A003) Failed by voice vote.

description: Amendment sought to reduce national missile defense operational test and evaluation funding by $174 million and increase defense health programs accordingly.
purpose: An amendment no. 8 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce national missile defense operational test and evaluation funding by $174 million and increase defense health programs accordingly.
